original: BOHLIN, Helge Einar Adolf, Rektor, Härnösand, f Äspered, Älvsb l, 17/9 92 av handl S Konrad Bohlin o Anna Johansson gm Eva Eisner. Studex v lat.lärov i Gbg 11, fil kand o fil mag i Lund 15, fysikstud i Tyskl fr 17. Ass v tekn högsk i Danzig 17—19, aman h riksförsäkr.anst 20, sed. 20 lekt i fysik o elek-trotekn samt rekt 37 v tekn gymn i H.sand (statl läroanst, gr 01 s tekn elem.sk, omorg t tekn gymn 19). Stdfm, styr.ordf i el.verket 0 i H.sands sk f yrk. und.v. Resor: Statsstip t Tyskl 22, Norge o Danm 39. Av trycket: Eine neue Anordn f röntgenkristallographische Untersuchungen von Kristallpulver (Ann d Physik 20), Undersökn rör skivform virvel-strömsbromsens verkn.sätt, H.sand 30, El Er-wärmung v Beton (Beton u Eisen 32), fi upps 1 detta ämne i sv tidskr, Elektrotekn Grundbegrepp, Gaslagarna, Räkneuppg i Elektrotekn, El.lära o Elektrotekn, medarb i Norrl.-boken. RNO.
translated: BOHLIN, Helge Einar Adolf, Principal, Härnösand, born in Äspered, Älvsborg county, on September 17, 1892, to merchant S Konrad Bohlin and Anna Johansson. Married to Eva Eisner. Studied at the Latin school in Gothenburg until 1911. Completed a bachelor's and master's degree in Lund in 1915. Pursued physics studies in Germany from 1917. Assistant at the Technical University in Danzig from 1917 to 1919. Employed at the National Insurance Institute in 1920. Lecturer in physics and electrical engineering, and later became principal in 1937, at the technical gymnasium in Härnösand (a state educational institution, with a technical elementary school established in 1901 and reorganized as a technical gymnasium in 1919). Member of the board and chairman of the electricity company in Härnösand, as well as a vocational education instructor. Travelled to Germany on a state scholarship in 1922, and to Norway and Denmark in 1939. Published works include: "Eine neue Anordnung für röntgenkristallographische Untersuchungen von Kristallpulver" (Annalen der Physik, 1920), "Undersökningar rörande skivformig virvelströmsbromsens verkningssätt, Härnösand" (1930), "Elektroerwärmung von Beton" (Beton und Eisen, 1932), and a paper on this subject in a Swedish journal. Also contributed to the Norrland yearbook. Member of the Royal Swedish Society of Naval Sciences (RNO).

memberOf.name: Royal Swedish Society of Naval Sciences (RNO)
